data.name: ConfirmDelete.Text
data.value: Do you really want to delete this image?

data.name: labelAlt.Help
data.value: Enter a short alternate description for the image, which could be used by a browser instead of the image. If not specified, module will try to use image title instead.

data.name: labelTitle.Help
data.value: Enter title for the image, which will be displayed beside the image, and could be used as alternate description, if last one not specified.

data.name: labelImage.Help
data.value: An image to add to the gallery.

data.name: labelLink.Help
data.value: Link to a resource to open then image is clicked.

data.name: labelStartDate.Help
data.value: Enter the date from current image should be published on the site.

data.name: labelEndDate.Help
data.value: Enter the date from current image should be removed from publication on the site.

data.name: btnDeleteWithFile_Confirm.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this image along with the associated file? Note that file will be deleted only if it's not referenced by other images or DNN content items.

data.name: lblOpenInLightbox.Help
data.value: If checked, module will try to open the image in the lightbox.

data.name: lblCssClass.Help
data.value: CSS classes for the image to use instead of defined in module settings.
